name: Flightless (Birbjam #1)
description:
I feel like I learned a lot about how unity and game making works in the short time I worked on this, but not quite enough to make it run smoothly! I still wanted to submit it - we all start somewhere and I had fun putting it together

[EDIT] - I have uploaded a second version with a more reliable fall reset, and an escape menu which allows you to reset the level if you do end up getting stuck. I have also tweaked the view a little.
